item.title: Hope Hicks, Former Trump Official and Fox PR Chief, Joins Megyn Kelly’s Media Company
item.description: Hope Hicks, the former Trump White House communicatoins director and Fox Corp. communications chief, will join Megyn Kelly’s production company, Devil May Care Media, as chief operating officer,
